title: What Does It Mean to Be on a Winning (Or Losing) Streak? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by The Athletic’s Tony Jones to discuss the success of the Utah Jazz, who currently sit at the top of the league standings (2:00). They look at the team’s offseason turnaround after getting bounced in the bubble, Jordan Clarkson’s success, and more. Later, Chris is joined by The Ringer’s Megan Schuster to discuss the pain of rooting for the worst team in the league, the Minnesota Timberwolves (33:30).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Tony Jones and Megan Schuster
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
